items.sentence: How would you feel if someone said something like that about you?
I always just took it for granted that you would be there for me.
Tom resented the fact that Mary got the promotion instead of him.
Tom said that neither one of his parents had ever been to Boston.
Tom saw two men lying on the floor, bleeding from gunshot wounds.
Tom should have been eating more vegetables and not as much meat.
Even though Tom entered the room, Mary didn\'t stop kissing John.
Could you please tell me how tall you are and how much you weigh?
Do you really care when I get this done as long as I get it done?
Tom couldn\'t have finished writing the report without your help.
